titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the charitable deduction to all taxpayers regardless of whether a taxpayer itemizes deductions in order to encourage and increase charitable giving.

To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the charitable deduction to all taxpayers regardless of whether a taxpayer itemizes deductions in order to encourage and increase charitable giving.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: This bill allows all taxpayers to claim a tax deduction for charitable contributions whether or not they itemize their deductions or claim a standard deduction.
